/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes line the path, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A red truck can be seen in the distance, driving towards the right side of the image, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise tranquil setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye towards the horizon.
